Anesthetic Protocol:
Weight before surgery: ${object.sale_order_id.weight} kg
Premedication: Intramuscular injection of Medetomidine (SEDEDORM ®) 20 µg / kg and Ketamine (ANAESTAMINE ®) 15 mg / kg.Kétamine (ANAESTAMINE ®) 15 mg/kg.

Operating method:
A 0.5 cm incision is made on the skin of the scrotum, opposite each of the testicles.
An incision on each of the vagina, tunics independently surrounding each testicle, is made in order to access them. Ligation between the vas deferens and the vessels is performed before resection of the testes.
No suturing is necessary. The scrotal skin will heal on its own within a few days.

Treatments administered intraoperatively:
A subcutaneous injection of Meloxicam (METACAM Chat ®) at a dose of 0.2 mg / kg is performed.
Injection of a Medetomidine antagonist: Atipamezole (NOSEDORM ®) by intramuscular route at half the dose of Medetomidine injected for anesthesia, in order to facilitate recovery.
